plot: John Oliver explores origins and growth of US student loan debt. He scrutinizes loan servicers' mismanagement. Highlights Biden administration's debt cancellation efforts through existing program modifications, totaling millions in relief.

John Oliver discusses the massive student loans problem in United States of America. How the student loan program started and how big it has become over the years was explained by him. He also criticized how companies are mishandling the student loans of thousands of people. Finally show some appreciation for the band-aid efforts from the Biden administration to cancel millions of dollars worth student loans by tweaking the existing system.—Niaz Islam Arif
